thread.title: Kovacs Lands @ASunSoccer Player of the Week Honor
thread.title_full: Kovacs Lands @ASunSoccer Player of the Week Honor

title: Kovacs Lands @ASunSoccer Player of the Week Honor
text: Milan Kovacs the Men's Soccer Player of the Week. The midfielder scored the game-winning goal against Stetson on Saturday night.Kovacs has a knack for coming up with the big goal for the Ospreys this season and Saturday was no different. The junior is currently tied for the league lead with three game-winners, scoring the deciding goal against UCF on Sept. 9 and Georgia Southern on Sept. 27 in addition to Saturday's game-opening goal.His first goal on Saturday came just 14:09 into the contest off a feed from senior Alex Morrell . He fired a missile into the right corner of the net that froze Stetson goalkeeper Paul Ludwig. Kovacs served as the Ospreys top threat in the contest with a game-high five shots. He currently leads the Ospreys with four goals this season.The award is the first of Kovacs' career and the first by a North Florida men's soccer player this season. The, who are currently three points back of first place, clinched a playoff berth with the win on Saturday night, improving to 2-0-1 in A-Sun play.
